'''Key to Somewhere''' are Quest Items that are used to unlock an iron gate to the south-west of the [[Sanctum of Rainbow Spirits]] [[Domain]], leading to the [[Local Legend]] [[Fatui Pyro Agent|"Balachko" — Shadows Like Blades Deepening]] fight and a Precious Chest.

A small group of Koholasaurus warriors are camping outside the gate; the first key can be found in a closed cell, while the other is found dangling on a rope (which should shine as an interactable).
